name: Isomorph
description:
Isomorph is an atmospheric 3D puzzle-platformer. Solve dozens of challenging puzzles by changing the direction of gravity and manipulating physics, while being immersed in a calming ambient environment.Features:
  • 24 puzzles, yielding 6-8 hours of gameplay
  • A gun that can collect and place cubes
  • Gravity, Antigravity, and Nongravity cubes
  • Interactive lasers, pressure plates, and timers
  • A calming ambient soundtrack which evolves as the game progresses
  • Steam Cloud, Achievements, and Trading Cards
  • Windows, Mac, and Linux Support
